comments.body: It seems that there is no need to set start time here. However, I think we could get this merged first, and I will send another PR to cleanup the start time related thing later, because there are some other places need to be cleaned up.
I think the start time was here so that `SetPodStatus()` doesn't record a start time itself. If you want to compare the expected and the actual status, you'll need that.

Yeah, you are right. I was thinking about moving the StartTime initialization into `getRandomPodStatus()`, which may make the test a little cleaner. Because most time, we don't need to set the `StartTime` to specific value. :)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +761,765 @@	now := unversioned.Now()
	status.StartTime = &now
	m.SetPodStatus(staticPod, status)

	m.testSyncBatch()
